Warpcast Tipping Feature.text:
Hey Degens 🎩

Airdrop 2 — Season 14 is now live!

Hit the frame below to claim your well-earned $DEGEN.

Another legendary season of tipping madness in the books.

https://app.degen.tips

Where we are and where we're going

1. Recently, we've seen a decent increase in daily active users (DAU). Between 200K and 300K users open Warpcast every month. This needs to be 10-100x greater for Farcaster to be sustainable.

2. We've also seen a lot of previously "churned" users reactivate on Farcaster.

3. We've significantly upgraded our developer UX with mini apps (formerly frames) and wallet. 70K+ funded wallets.

4. We've scaled our USDC rewards programs for content, mini apps and invites. $250K+ in USDC rewards and growing.

5. We've introduced a new series of verifications to help developers better understand users on the protocol. Over 150K+ users have at least one verification.

6. We've launched airdrop offers, allowing developers to target Farcaster users who use their apps via mini apps.

7. Snapchain is launching soon. It's a novel, blockchain-like distributed system that will allow us to scale the protocol for the next 10x.

8. We've grown the team by 50% since the start of the year.

1/3

Miniapp Developer Page 

- Manage miniapps you've launched 
- Real-time feedback with app previews 
- Tools to generate manifests and other files

Please give us feedback, we plan to invest a lot here to improve this experience for devs. 

https://warpcast.com/~/developers
